attributes.action: rethink the Government's stance on the import duty on Mobility Scooters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reclassification of mobility scooters from "carriages for disabled persons" to "motor vehicles for the transport of persons", should be rescinded. 

It places an additional tax burden on individuals and charities that is unfair and inequitable. The equipment is an essential tool for living and should not be subject tax of any sort. 

We urge the Government to recommend the duty be stopped at the EU's Customs Code Committee.

government_responses.details:

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
